website_summaries.verdict: The Doro PhoneEasy 626 is a no-frills flip phone for Consumer Cellular customers who don't need to do anything other than talk and text.
cons: Need to navigate several menu layers to access certain functions

customer_reviews.title: but not as good as the Nokia
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my lovely small nokia flip phone. It is larger than I expected. Most of the features are OK, but not as good as the Nokia. The ring and text tones are OK. I wanted another basic flip phone to protect the keys and screen. I did not want a smart phone as they are more expensive to run and I have no need to carry a computer around with me! Most of the smart phones are getting bigger and bigger. If I want to take good pictures I use my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: the sound is good and clear
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partially sighted 93-year-old mother who finds it a breeze. It's very well made and looks classy - unlike the previous 2 Doro phones we've bought which were rather Mickey Mouse looking. It has a very clear bright screen and a very large font is available which mum can read without her magnifying glass. Also, the sound is good and clear, and the instructions are intuitively easy. All in all, an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: D R Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service they said up to a week for delivery ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service they said up to a week for delivery received next day, easy to set up nice size buttons my only concern is the directional button is flimsy and could possibly wear out quite quickly, But so far brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: S J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use. !
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted. Does exactly what it's meant to. I cannot fault this phone. I've had a Doro before and that was just as good, i passed that one (a 612) on to a relative just so i could buy this one. An excellent all-round phone, this for me is the best flip phone on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands phone and is the second one that he has purchased in about 3 years. He has passed his old one onto his 82 year old Mother, who can use it very well. Husband likes it as it is not complicated to use has a good loud ring (he wears a hearing aid) and very robust.
customer_reviews.author: Tractor Jane

customer_reviews.title: Proper Phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift recipient really pleased easy to use is a "telephone" and does the job required without all the unwanted stuff on most of today's phones.
customer_reviews.author: Blue cheese

customer_reviews.title: And it's easy to
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this phone. It does everything she needs a phone for. I. E. Phone calls, sms, it also takes and sends photos. And it does those things really well. And it's easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Steve Muhl

customer_reviews.title: the doro is fine for my age group this is my second doro ...
customer_reviews.text: the doro is fine for my age group this is my second doro and it is all i need a phone not a mobile computer if you want to talk send me an e'mail
customer_reviews.author: GUZZGUNNER

customer_reviews.title: so easy to set-up also to operate
customer_reviews.text: Superb phone, so easy to set-up also to operate, good battery life, very clear sound. Very good delivery from time of ordering. My only small criticism is the camera as it is only 2Mp, wish Doro did a 5Mp in this model.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Surfer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for my 83 year old
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for my 83 year old, partially sighted mum, text can be made nice and big. Loud and clear so no problems hearing either. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Burns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have had easy and reliable , recommend to anyone..all ages
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this phone, so easy to use I'm so glad I bought it. Best phone I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my dad who didn't want a phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who didn't want a phone with too many options but wanted a few. He loves it and can hook it up to handsfree in the car with the Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: jamie cuffe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the older user
customer_reviews.text: Mum loves this phone, big buttons and easy to use. Scarily loud ringtone she won't miss a call on this handset.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Cdan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT. No touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: GREAT. No touchscreen.No smart phone. ITS A PHONE its not a games consol, it`s not for internet browsing, It`s for phone calls & texts.....
customer_reviews.author: Busyboy

customer_reviews.title: as my elderly relatives liked the browser and games on their old
customer_reviews.text: Pity this phone doesnt have a web browser and limited games, as my elderly relatives liked the browser and games on their old phones
customer_reviews.author: Mechan-man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the product, love the colour, exactly what I wanted,
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jones

customer_reviews.title: very good phone easy to use and good service from
customer_reviews.text: very good phone easy to use and good service from supplier
customer_reviews.author: mr r j bullivant

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for it my wife who thinks it's fine for her needs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for it my wife who thinks it's fine for her needs. However do not be misleas into thinking you can use it 'on line'. You can't.
customer_reviews.author: John Peter Bowker

customer_reviews.title: Replaced
customer_reviews.text: Sent the first one back with button illumination faults. I will see how replacement goes.
customer_reviews.author: G. G. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, so simple to use flip open to answer and close to end call, had a flip phone before loved that but for some reason they went out of fashion. this was the only one available but not disappointed. Manufacturers should keep in mind there are a lot of folk out their of similar age to myself 60ish who want a phone that is not rocket science folds away to fit in your pocket or bag and simply makes calls and sends texts and can take a decent photo.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Storey

customer_reviews.title: A good mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: A good well constructed 2G/3G mobile phone without the fuss of touch screens and Apps. Plenty of features if your hearing isn't good or your eye sight is poor, though that is not why I chose it. The bluetooth interface works ok, but appears to lack a couple of features such as smooth transfer of phonebook details to my car's bluetooth system.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully it doesn't have a touch screen!
customer_reviews.text: Smart in appearance and easy to set up and use. Will have to wait to see how durable it is but it seems sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: LizD

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and seller!!
customer_reviews.text: very fast shipping to my country (two days amazing) thanks all concerned , the phone is excellent for us oldies..
customer_reviews.author: Mr J L Cross

customer_reviews.title: HASNT LASTED A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: wont charge - waiting to hear from seller re their warrenty
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife she think its best phone out there
customer_reviews.author: Mr K R Spratling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived promptly - does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.author: VeeVee

customer_reviews.title: minor error
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone except plus ..minus slide control on side is in the wrong position is in the way when holding phone on a call
customer_reviews.author: balisea

product_meta.title: Doro Phone Easy 624 SIM-Free Mobile Telephone - Red
product_meta.description:
The Doro PhoneEasy 624 is a stylish clamshell camera phone with loud and clear sound that comes with a weather feature and remote management. All the details and functions are designed for ease of use on the Doro PhoneEasy 624 telephone and you can even send video messages as easily as you take and share photos making it easier than ever to share content with family and friends.

Further features of the Doro PhoneEasy 624 clamshell mobile phone include: Extra loud and clear sound, speakerphone, backlit keypad, keytone, talking keys, startup wizard, FM radio, weather function, assistance button, torch, calculator, games, calendar with reminder, daily reminder, wake up alarm, remote programming (OTA), camera resolution (2mp), camera flash, image viewer, video recording 3gp (240x320 & 144x176), 60 call log positions, 2 one touch memories, 500 phonebook positions, photo phonebook, notes, colour display, big display text, optional display modes optimised for visually impaired users, adjustable font size, contrast adjustment, customisable wallpaper, SMS, SMS key, predictive text, MMS, my doro manager (online storage (1024MB), add- remove or edit contacts, add - edit or remove calendar events, add or remove pictures, add - remove or edit daily reminders, adjust important settings), 22 polyphonic ringtones, visual ring indicator, vibrating ringer, 7 ringer volume settings, ringer off setting, maximum receiving amplification (35dB),hearing aid compatibility rating T4/M4 (3G)&T4/M3 (2G), maximum ringer volume (83dB(A) at 1 metre, microphone mute, volume settings, tone control, HD voice certified, separated keys, headset outlet (3.5mm), standby time (upto 380 hours), talk time (upto 10 hours), GSM (band) 900/1800/1900, 3G and Bluetooth

BOX CONTAINS
Doro PhoneEasy 624 Handset
User Manual
Addendum<br)Battery
Headset
USB Cable
3 Pin Plug
Charger Cradle
Lanyard
feature_bullets: Easy to use camera with flash
